参考书籍

量子力学

  1. Principles of Quantum Mechanics, by R. Shankar, 内部链接
  2. Quantum Mechanics II: A Second Course in Quantum Theory, by Rubin H. Landau, 内部链接
  3. Quantum Mechanics, by Albert Messiah, 内部链接
  4. Practical Quantum Mechanics, by S. Fluegge, 内部链接
  5. Quantum Mechanics: A Modern Development, by Leslie E Ballentine, 内部链接
  6. Angular Momentum, by D. M. Brink, G. R. Satchler, 内部链接

量子多体

  1. The Nuclear Many-Body Problem by P. Ring and P. Schuck, 内部链接

量子少体

  1. The Quantum Mechanical Few Body Problem by Walter Gloeckle, 内部链接

量子散射

  1. Quantum Collision Theory, by Charles J. Joachain, 内部链接

原子核物理

  1. The Nuclear Shell Model: Study Edition, by Kris Heyde, 内部链接
  2. Nuclear Structure Vol. I, by Aage Bohr, Ben R. Mottelson, 内部链接
  3. Nuclear Structure Volume II Nuclear Deformations, by Aage Bohr, Ben R. Mottelson, 内部链接
  4. Computational Nuclear Physics 1 Nuclear Structure by M. ValliÃ¨res, H. Wu (auth.), Prof. K. Langanke, Prof. Joachim A. Maruhn, Prof. S. E. Koonin (eds.) 内部链接
  5. Computational Nuclear Physics 2 Nuclear Reactions by R. Machleidt (auth.), K. Langanke, J. A. Maruhn, S. E. Koonin (eds.) 内部链接
  6. Nuclear Reactions for Astrophysics: Principles, Calculation and Applications of Low-Energy Reactions, by Ian J. Thompson and Filomena M. Nunes 内部链接
  7. Introduction to Nuclear Reactions, by G.R. Satchler, 内部链接
  8. Direct Nuclear Reactions, by G.R. Satchler, 内部链接
  9. Introductory nuclear physics, by Kenneth S. Krane 内部链接
  10. Modern Nuclear Chemistry by Walter D. Loveland, David J. Morrissey, Glenn T. Seaborg 内部链接

Fortran与数值计算

  1. Numerical Recipes in Fortran 77，by W.H.Press，S.A.Teukolsky, W.T.Vetterling, and B.P.Flannery 内部链接
  2. Computational Physics, by Morten Hjorth-Jensen, 内部链接

相关讲义

  1. Survey of Nuclear Physics, PHY 492/802, 2017 (MSU), by Prof. Witold (Witek) Nazarewicz 内部链接
  2. Introduction to Nuclear Physics, by Zach Meisel, 内部链接
